summary: This bill, the Leading Exports of Aerial Drones Act of 2025 (LEAD Act), amends the Arms Export Control Act to address export controls for unmanned aircraft systems (drones). It defines "covered unmanned aircraft systems and items" and mandates they be treated similarly to manned aircraft for export control purposes, specifically regarding the Missile Technology Control Regime. The bill also directs the President to amend the International Traffic in Arms Regulations to reflect these changes, including separate review criteria for drones.
